error message?
sudo is usually kind of consistent.. either it works or it doesn't.. the command after sudo might fail though
what did you do when you tried installing wine?
sudo apt-get install wine ?
yes..  did that work?
what makes you think it didn't?
sudo doesn't *always* ask for your password
if you've done it once.. you've got a specific time before it asks again..
ok.. would you mind doing something for me?
open a terminal and write.. whoami
it should write out your username
now run this "sudo whoami". It should write out "root"
did you have to enter your password?
yes
that's because you had already used sudo ... just recently
is that what you meant by "sudo not working"?
so then sudo worked.. you were just expecting it to prompt you for the password.. which it didn't =)
no worries.. everyone has to learn this stuff in the beginning
you're welcome
